articles.description: The Virginia Department of Health is reminding everyone to practice good health habits, as cases of COVID-19 continue to increase across Virginia, and as we approach one of the most popular holidays of the year. Some localities in southwest Virginia are seein…

articles.title: COVID-19 may be linked to brain complications, study finds. But does it cause them? - USA TODAY
articles.description: Severe cases of COVID-19 may be linked to brain complications, according to the first nationwide survey of the neurological complications.
articles.content:

articles.title: U.S. CDC Coronavirus Data Bombshell Could Have a Huge Silver Lining - CCN.com
articles.description: CDC Director Robert Redfield has suggested there could be as many as 24 million cases of the coronavirus - 10x the current confirmed cases.
articles.content:
